structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

text.section: The Transportation Cabinet shall attempt to maintain the character of a state-maintained road that has been designated a scenic highway.
The Transportation Cabinet shall erect and maintain appropriate scenic highway identification signs on each road designated a scenic byway or scenic highway.
The Transportation Cabinet shall conduct necessary routine maintenance and care of a state-maintained road designated as a scenic highway.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 566, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998.
